animeTitle: Rin x Sen: Hakudaku Onna Kyoushi to Yaroudomo
animeDescription: Based on a doujin game by Orcsoft.Saiki Yasuo is a 45 years old office worker. After 20 years of marriage, his wife asked for a divorce and left him. Now, depressed, he spends the nights drinking alone, until one night a girl from the St. Marian Academy approaches him looking for a client.(Source: English DLSite)
animeRelated: ['Prequel: Sei Yariman Gakuen Enkou Nikki The Animation', 'Other: Sei Yariman Sisters Pakopako Nikki The Animation']
